exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type ll : list X k : nat l, r : list X Hll : ll = l ++ r Hlen : length l = S k The term "last ll" has type "X -> X" while it is expected to have type "X".
In environment X : Type ll : list X k : nat l, r : list X Hll : ll = l ++ r Hlen : length l = S k The term "l" has type "list X" while it is expected to have type "X".
In environment X : Type ll : list X k : nat l, r : list X Hll : ll = l ++ r Hlen : length l = S k The term "r" has type "list X" while it is expected to have type "X".
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
In environment X : Type ll : list X k : nat l, r : list X Hll : ll = l ++ r Hlen : length l = S k The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "list ?A".
Found no subterm matching "length l" in the current goal.
In environment X : Type ll : list X k : nat l, r : list X Hll : ll = l ++ r Hlen : length l = S k The term "ll" has type "list X" while it is expected to have type "?l ~p ?l'".

original: intros X ll k H. apply list_split_length in H. destruct H as [l [r [Hll Hlen]]]. exists (last ll). exists l. exists r. split. - rewrite Hll. apply (concat_cons X l (removelast(ll))). - rewrite Hlen. apply (Permutation_length ll l).
